name: Kingdom of Memories (Soline Carton)
description:
Kingdom of memoreise is a platformer game where you embody Tiffany.

She is a young girl that love her granpa despit his memory loss. One day she decide to go to the kingdom of memory to find photo from the past to help her granpa recover his mind.

Enjoy your adventur in this stange kingdom!

Made By:

Justine Crepel ( graphisme )

Soline Carton ( graphisme and animation )

Yvain Audéon ( level design, programation, and implementation )
